sentence: I have based the syntax basically on common sense , it should not be hard for anyone .

sentence: Needless to say , it was an interesting first session !

sentence: `` It does suggest that that there could be other ways to form life , not just how life formed on early Earth , '' said Foster , who was not part of Wolfe-Simon 's research team .

sentence: They are inevitably inclined to echo the conventional pap , since this is the least controversial option that is open to them .

reason: 句子的语序不正确。在英语中，通常主语和谓语动词的顺序是“主语-谓语-宾语”，而这个句子的结构是倒装的，这种倒装在实际使用中较少见，且在这个句子中并不合适。另外，'are they' 应该是 'they are'，'echo the conventional pap' 这个短语也可能让人感到困惑，因为 'pap' 通常指无聊或无价值的话语，但这个用法不是错误，只是语境上可能较为生僻。

sentence: This notion of immigration being a burden and a problem , may be an electoral asset , but it is economically very costly .

sentence: A friend of mine was in an underground computer center in downtown SF when the quake hit .

sentence: If these assumptions hold , voters in races for Congress face what in economic theory is called a prisoner 's dilemma and have an incentive , at the margin , to lean Democratic .

sentence: To the extent that potential Republican candidates and their financial backers realize that the congressional prisoner 's dilemma game works to their disadvantage , the Republican Party will be hindered in its attempts to field a competitive slate of congressional candidates .
mut_sentence: To the extent that potential Republican candidates and their financial backers realize the congressional prisoner's dilemma game works to their disadvantage, hindered will be the Republican Party in its attempts to field a competitive slate of congressional candidates.
reason: 句子的结构较为复杂，但其主要的语法问题在于使用了将来时态的被动语态「hindered will be」，这在英语中是不常见的。通常，我们会说「the Republican Party will be hindered」或者「hindered will be the attempts of the Republican Party」。此外，「field a competitive slate of congressional candidates」是一个固定搭配，但在本句中，由于前面复杂的结构，使得整个句子读起来不自然。

sentence: Some 44 % of respondents across the region pronounced themselves satisfied with how their country 's democracy works in practice , the same figure as last year but a big increase on the 25 % in 2001 ( chart 3 ) .
mut_sentence: The same figure as last year but a big increase on the 25 % in 2001 is pronounced by some 44 % of respondents across the region, satisfied with how their country's democracy works in practice (chart 3).
reason: 这句话在语法和语义上都是正确的。它表达了一个调查结果，即有44%的受访者认为他们国家的民主运作实践与去年相同，但与2001年的25%相比有大幅增长。句子结构清晰，没有语法错误，且语义表达符合逻辑。

sentence: But his new-found buddy had matched him drink for drink until he lost count , and the man 's eyes were still clear .
mut_sentence: But his new-found buddy had matched him drink for drink until he lost count, and still were the man's eyes clear.
reason: 句中的时态不一致。'had matched' 是过去完成时，而 'were' 应该是过去时 'were' 的错误形式，正确的应该是 'were still' 或者使用现在时 'are'。此外，'and still were the man's eyes clear' 这个表达方式不太自然，通常我们会说 'and still, the man's eyes were clear' 或者 'and yet the man's eyes were clear'。

sentence: Giovanni Peri has calculated that a rise of 1 % in the migratory flow causes an increase of between 0,6 and 0,9 % in real long-term pay .
mut_sentence: Giovanni Peri has calculated that a rise of 1 % in the migratory flow causes an increase between 0,6 and 0,9 % in real long-term pay to occur.
reason: 该句子在语法和语义上都是正确的。主语Giovanni Peri与谓语动词has calculated搭配合理，宾语从句中使用了正确的时态和语态，且表达的意思符合逻辑，没有违背常识。另外，使用了正确的百分比表达方式和介词搭配（a rise of 1 %, an increase between 0,6 and 0,9 %）。

sentence: `` As a result , organisms have a hard time telling these elements apart . ''

sentence: Ballooning at the de rigueur hour of 6 a.m. held all the attraction for most people of sunrise root-canal work .
mut_sentence: All the attraction for most people of sunrise root-canal work was held by ballooning at the de rigueur hour of 6 a.m.
reason: 句子的结构复杂且混乱，使得意思不清晰。首先，'root-canal work' 与 'sunrise' 结合在一起不太通顺，因为日出和根管治疗没有直接联系。其次，'attraction...was held by ballooning' 这个表达方式不太自然，因为通常不会说吸引力被某个活动所持有。最后，'de rigueur' 这个词在这里的使用似乎不恰当，因为它通常用来描述时尚或社交场合中必须遵守的规则，而不是描述时间。

sentence: You must understand , I have n't been in this state too long .

reason: 句子的语序不正确。正确的语序应该是'I must understand, I have not been in this state too long.' 或者 'You must understand, I have not been in this state too long.' 原句中的'Understand you must'是一个不自然的结构，除非在模仿Yoda的语法，这在日常英语中是不常见的。
